full_text.0: BLACKBURN takes money from big pharma as her constituents die from opioid overdose... https://t.co/PE1eTY68VC
full_text.1:
dr “We are worried about opioids. Try not to take them. But we have this spray that will help with an accidental OD”

Me “Ok sounds great!”

RX “opioids cost 4 dollars the spray will cost you 95”

Lol. Trying to put my finger on why we have an opioid problem.
